one_reviews_text: I loved this game a lot. Looks very cool, and it's funny either. I didn't have problems with the controls so I enjoyed it a lot, but after a few level, I just can't go further anymore, and I admit that I m not a genius, but still don't get it what I supposed to do... I love it, but I reached a level on the first day, that I can't beat, even I try so hard... Thanks for answer to the developers! I'm glad to see that some creators  cares about their product after years! It's not a well used thing on Oculus, so I give the five stars, and I'll try to beat that beastie game again. Cheers!
review_feedback: Hi! Hopefully, you will beat it soon enough! But, if it is a bit too much, be sure to contact us at support@zenstudios.com so we can help a little!

review_title: Looks like a fun TD arcade game
one_reviews_text: However, I am using the Xbox One Controller (that comes with the Rift) and it's almost impossible to aim with either the bow & arrow or the ballista because the controls are way too sensitive. There is no option to slide the sensitivity of the joystick controls. Makes game almost impossible to play. Even then, I would say it doesn't control as smoothly as it should, janky controls overall. That's a shame because I was enjoying the level designs and the TD elements, but with spotty controls at best, I have no choice but to stop playing and uninstall.
review_feedback: Hi Superattorney! Thanks for your feedback! How was your overall experience about the game? Did you find success playing with the controller? Let us know if we could help you with anything else at support@zenstudios.com!

review_title: One of the greatest tower defense games
one_reviews_text:
This is a full fletched tower defence game with a lot of content. A lot of campaign missions, levels and fullfilling upgrades, troop management, castle editor, and half decent story.  Been playing for 5 hours straight when I first bought it and theres a lot of gameplay left. Really replayable too!

Works with touch, but is really meant to be played with a controller, as 3d hand movement is not used.

If you loved the "Age of war", "Defend your castle" and other stick castle war games on browsers/mobile.... and you want it without any microtransactions? This is your game!

YUUGE creds to the devs for NOT making this an another microtransactions game.
used to work, although with spotty controls, but now crashes every time i try to load and click a single button.  uninstalling and reinstalling does NOT fix the problem.
review_feedback: Hi! Thanks for your feedback! Did you find success starting the game? If not, please contact us at support@zenstudios.com? We'd be glad to help you out with this issue! Thanks!

one_reviews_text: Ok game, didn't really hook me in. I love tower defense games, but I wouldn't really call this a traditional tower defense game. Action rpg? definitely not. Overpriced IMO, more like a browser game.
review_feedback: Hi meh! Thanks for your feedback! What do you think, how could we improve our game, so you'd have a much better experience next time?

one_reviews_text: Is this supposed to work with touch controllers?  It does not.  First task is shooting a ballista, and that's a complete fail with touch.
review_feedback: Hi armoden! Could you please contact us at support@zenstudios.com? We'd be glad to help you out with this issue! Thanks!

one_reviews_text: This crashes when the first button is pressed. No other Rift game I have crashes.
review_feedback: Hi Joebwan! Did you found success starting the game? If we could help you in any way please contact us at support@zenstudios.com!

one_reviews_text: Fun to pplay with a great VR experience! Please more of that :-)
